item.title: about me
item.description: A software engineer, a husband and a father. This’ space I store all notes. In case something here’s usedful with you, feel free to read. Personal space, so no tracking, no comments and no ads. Feel free to contact me through ledongthuc [a] gmail.com if any feedbacks Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ledongthuc/ Github: https://github.com/ledongthuc/
